description: This file demonstrates the usage of Huggingface embedder within an agent knowledge base, including obtaining embeddings for a sample text and initializing a vector database connection.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: Represents a vector database connection using PostgreSQL with pgvector extension.

classes.name: AgentKnowledge
classes.description: Encapsulates agent's knowledge base, including vector database and related configurations.

methods.name: get_embedding
methods.description: Generates embeddings for a given input text using Huggingface embedder.
